description.text: You don’t want just another job. Well, we’re not just another company.
We like to keep things as simple as possible so we can get to what’s really important - finding out more about you.

We’ve broken down our hiring process into four key stages, highlighting what to expect, our promise to you, and how to excel at each stage. Please note for some roles the process can vary, for example the task may come before the interview, or be skipped entirely.

The start of our application process is the same for all of our roles. We want to learn a bit about you through a casual conversation. Learn more about the interview process by watching the below video.
We love connecting with people who believe they’ll make a difference. At this stage, an interview will help us both decide whether the interest is mutual.

Now it’s time to apply your thinking to some real life situations. Whether it’s completing a technical test, engaging in a role play or preparing a presentation to address a challenge - we want to see you in action.
Once you’ve met the team, and we’ve gotten to know each other, it’s time for us to both decide whether we’re a match.

For me, working at Checkout.com gives me the perfect balance between structure and freedom. I have a roadmap but I can experiment within it, and I can create my own processes and share them with my team.

True story, I joined Checkout.com two years ago and I opened the French sales desk and we are now 50 people. It’s super exciting to see how fast Checkout.com is growing, but also with the same team spirit and values.

Checkout.com has supported me in following my passion. I’ve moved teams and been able to make a huge impact as a result. And doing it in a team that is equally dedicated to what they do makes the journey all the more enjoyable!

job_search_title.text: We’re looking for passionate, self-motivated and daring individuals to join our team.

empty_results_description.text: Sorry we don’t have any jobs based based on your selection, try removing some of the filters and try again

form_title.text: We love to connect with people who want to make a change

form_description.text: So feel free to get in touch even if you don’t see a role here that fits your skills. Complete the form with your CV and a few words about why you’d like to join us.

confirmation_message_title.text: Thank you for your interest in joining Checkout.com

confirmation_message_description.text: We’re going to evaluate your resume and get in touch the minute we have a vacancy that suits you

resume_validation_error.text: Please upload a file less than 10MB.

privacy_policy_text.text: By submitting this form I have read and acknowledged the Privacy Policy.

description.text: We work as one team. Wherever you come from. However you identify. And whichever payment method you use.
Our clients come from all over the world — and so do we. Hiring hard-working people and giving them a community to thrive in is critical to our success.
When you join our team, we’ll empower you to unlock your potential so you can do your best work. We’d love to hear how you think you could make a difference here with us.

find_out_more.text: We want to set you up for success and make our process as accessible as possible. So let us know in your application, or message talent.acquisition@checkout.com, if you need anything to make your experience more comfortable. We’ll be happy to support you.
Find out more about Diversity & Inclusion at Checkout.com.

dce_quote.text: "Creating a culture where everyone is welcome is key for us"

dce_description.text: We are proud to be an accredited Disability Confident Employer (Level 2).

description.text: Find answers below to some key questions about our hiring process. Still have a question? Feel free to reach out to us directly at talent.acquisition@checkout.com.

question.text: Will you let me know when a role has been filled?

answer.text: If you’re in the interview process and the role you’re applying for gets filled, we’ll always let you know. Jobs are immediately taken down from all platforms when they’re filled or when we are no longer accepting new applicants.

question.text: Can I apply for multiple jobs?

answer.text: Yes, you can apply for multiple roles. It’s also worth noting that if we see your application come through for one role and think you’d be better suited for another, we’ll tell you.

question.text: How many jobs can I apply for at once?

answer.text: We suggest applying for no more than three jobs at a time.

question.text: I interviewed/applied last year and wasn’t selected. Can I reapply?

answer.text: Yes, absolutely. We’d love to reconnect, especially if you received positive feedback.

question.text: I’ve applied for a tech role, what does the technical interview involve?

answer.text: All technical interviews involve a take-home task that will test your capabilities with any technologies you will be working with in the role.

question.text: Do you consider past candidates' applications for future openings?

answer.text: If we think a candidate has potential for future positions, we’ll keep them in mind for future roles and be in touch.

question.text: How long does the process take?

answer.text: From submitting your application to accepting an offer, the process usually takes four to six weeks. It’s sometimes less depending on the role.

question.text: Will I receive feedback on my application and what form will it take?

answer.text: You will receive written feedback on all stages following the recruiter screen.

question.text: Do you take feedback on the application process?

answer.text: Absolutely. Our candidate experience surveys help us continue improving.

question.text: How often do I have to go into the office?

answer.text: Beginning on August 1st, Checkout.com will embrace a hybrid approach in which employees are required to be in the office three days per week on Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday. We deeply believe that this approach will allow for more opportunities for our employees to collaborate and build meaningful relationships.

question.text: Are you accepting applications from Ukrainian citizens for your open roles?

answer.text: Yes, we welcome applications from Ukrainian citizens for our open roles and can support with working visas where possible.

main_title.text: We celebrate diversity and welcome a variety of experiences.
